    • Constructor Detail

      • Factor

        public Factor(SampleSizeTree _tree,
              java.lang.String _sFactor)
        This class encapsulates design factors - factors within a configuration. It calculates the absolute size of this factor, and the indices dependent count for this factor. That makes it easy to calculate size and count for the configuration.
        Parameters:
        _tree - pointer to SampleSizeTree
        _sFactor - description of actual 'Factor' content
